creator: RoadHow
descriptionHtml:
RoadHow is the cool new driving app that allows drivers to build a personal score to show just how good a driver you are – then share it with your Insurance company to earn discounts on your annual insurance policy.

Drivers who invest in their skills have a better chance of being seen as being ‘lower risk’ by insurance companies, as well as helping to make you safer on the road.

Simply download the app, create a profile by registering and then get started……take courses, answer questions, save money, earn rewards and start your journey to becoming a safer driver on the road.

Customers who choose to sign up for a Premium or VIP account will need their driving licence to hand as part of the registration process.

Key Features:

• Build your own RoadRating to share with your Insurer
• Answer questions any time you like as long as you are online
• Simple, easy and fast
• Invest in your driving skills and knowledge to help make you a better driver
• Learn about your own Strengths and Weaknesses
• RoadHow will tell you how you can improve your driving
• Build a history of achievements within the app to share with Insurers

This app is free to download. Within the app, users can make in-app purchases ranging from £0.35 to £50.00 should they choose to.

Should you encounter any problems please contact us at support@roadhow.co.uk

The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

This product includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank.

Part of the delivery of RoadHow incorporates the use of service messages to do with functionality and the use of your subscription which we will deliver via push notifications.

descriptionHtml:
Pass your DVSA Learner Driver Theory test. Improve your driving. Get insurance discounts. Earn rewards and money off - all with the official RoadHow app!

Want to pass your DVSA Learner Driver Theory test? Want to get access to insurance discounts? Want to save money on great brands all year round? Welcome to RoadHow, the place to pass your DVSA Theory Test, the place to get insurance discounts and the place to save up to £1,300 every year on great brands that you buy every day!

How do I get started?

1. Are you a learner driver who wants to pass the DVSA Theory test and get on the road? Download RoadHow and answer all of the questions from the DVSA revision question bank. Pass your DVSA Theory Test by using RoadHow to prepare and you’ll build a score that insurance companies will start to use to offer discounts on premiums. No other app offers data-driven insurance premium discounts after passing your DVSA Theory Test. Simply download the app, create a profile by registering and then get started……take DVSA question courses, review DVSA Hazard Perception clips and pass that DVSA Theory test now!

2. Are you a qualified driver looking to save money on your insurance? RoadHow will help you do that. RoadHow allows drivers to build a personal score to show just how good a driver you are – then share it with your insurance company to earn discounts on your annual insurance policy. Drivers who invest in their skills have a better chance of being seen as being ‘lower risk’ by insurance companies, as well as helping to make you safer on the road. Simply download the app, create a profile by registering and then get started……take courses, answer questions, save money, earn rewards and start your journey to becoming a safer driver on the road.

3. Are you cost-conscious and like to save money? RoadHow can help you do that too. Sign-up for RoadHow Rewards from inside the RoadHow app and you can save up to £1,300 on everyday purchases from the likes of ASDA, Apple, M&S, Samsung, adidas, Odeon, Pure Gym, Vue Cinemas, Sainsbury’s, Ted Baker, boohoo, Morrisons, Tesco, Nike and so many more. It’s easy, quick and you can start to save straight away!

4. Need an app that helps you every day? Want to plan your trips? Need security? Want to check out suspicious vehicles near your house? Want to store all of your important documents in one place? Want electronic reminders for all of the key dates in your driving calendar? Want to manage insurance claims in one app? Download RoadHow – there’s so much to enjoy!

Customers who choose to sign up for a Premium or VIP account will need their driving licence to hand as part of the registration process.

Key Features:
• Pass your DVSA Learner Driver Theory Test
• Practice Hazard Perception clips
• Build your own RoadRating to share with your insurer
• Answer questions any time you like as long as you are online
• Simple, easy and fast
• Save up to £1,300 every year with discounts, offers and cashback of great brands
• Invest in your driving skills and knowledge to help make you a better driver
• Learn about your own Strengths and Weaknesses
• RoadHow will tell you how you can improve your driving
• Build a history of achievements within the app to share with insurers
• Take DVSA questions to pass your driving theory test or motorcycle theory test

This app is free to download. Within the app, users can make in-app purchases ranging from £0.35 to £50.00 should they choose to.

Should you encounter any problems please contact us at support@roadhow.co.uk.

The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

creator: RoadHow
descriptionHtml:
Pass your DVSA Learner Driver Theory test. Improve your driving. Get insurance discounts. Earn rewards and money off - all with the official RoadHow app!

Want to pass your DVSA Learner Driver Theory test? Want to get access to insurance discounts? Want to save money on great brands all year round? Welcome to RoadHow, the place to pass your DVSA Theory Test, the place to get insurance discounts and the place to save up to £1,300 every year on great brands that you buy every day!

How do I get started?

1. Are you a learner driver who wants to pass the DVSA Theory test and get on the road? Download RoadHow and answer all of the questions from the DVSA revision question bank. Pass your DVSA Theory Test by using RoadHow to prepare and you’ll build a score that insurance companies will start to use to offer discounts on premiums. No other app offers data-driven insurance premium discounts after passing your DVSA Theory Test. Simply download the app, create a profile by registering and then get started……take DVSA question courses, review DVSA Hazard Perception clips and pass that DVSA Theory test now!

2. Are you a qualified driver looking to save money on your insurance? RoadHow will help you do that. RoadHow allows drivers to build a personal score to show just how good a driver you are – then share it with your insurance company to earn discounts on your annual insurance policy. Drivers who invest in their skills have a better chance of being seen as being ‘lower risk’ by insurance companies, as well as helping to make you safer on the road. Simply download the app, create a profile by registering and then get started……take courses, answer questions, save money, earn rewards and start your journey to becoming a safer driver on the road.

3. Are you cost-conscious and like to save money? RoadHow can help you do that too. Sign-up for RoadHow Rewards from inside the RoadHow app and you can save up to £1,300 on everyday purchases from the likes of ASDA, Apple, M&S, Samsung, adidas, Odeon, Pure Gym, Vue Cinemas, Sainsbury’s, Ted Baker, boohoo, Morrisons, Tesco, Nike and so many more. It’s easy, quick and you can start to save straight away!

4. Need an app that helps you every day? Want to plan your trips? Need security? Want to check out suspicious vehicles near your house? Want to store all of your important documents in one place? Want electronic reminders for all of the key dates in your driving calendar? Want to manage insurance claims in one app? Download RoadHow – there’s so much to enjoy!

Customers who choose to sign up for a Premium or VIP account will need their driving licence to hand as part of the registration process.

Key Features:
• Pass your DVSA Learner Driver Theory Test
• Practice Hazard Perception clips
• Build your own RoadRating to share with your insurer
• Answer questions any time you like as long as you are online
• Simple, easy and fast
• Save up to £1,300 every year with discounts, offers and cashback of great brands
• Invest in your driving skills and knowledge to help make you a better driver
• Learn about your own Strengths and Weaknesses
• RoadHow will tell you how you can improve your driving
• Build a history of achievements within the app to share with insurers
• Take DVSA questions to pass your driving theory test or motorcycle theory test

This app is free to download. Within the app, users can make in-app purchases ranging from £0.35 to £50.00 should they choose to.

Should you encounter any problems please contact us at support@roadhow.co.uk.

The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

This product includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank.

Part of the delivery of RoadHow incorporates the use of service messages to do with functionality and the use of your subscription, delivered via push notifications.

Want electronic reminders for all of the key dates in your driving calendar? Want to manage insurance claims in one app? Download RoadHow – there’s so much to enjoy!
